'Metoclopramide' (INN) is an antiemetic and gastroprokinetic agent. It belongs
to a group of medicines called Â´dopaminergicÂ´ blockers. It is commonly used to
treat nausea and vomiting, to facilitate gastric emptying in people with
gastroparesis, and as a treatment for the gastric stasis often associated with
migraine headaches.
